data.comment: The big names in today's match at Arena da Baixada have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 3, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
The match at Arena da Baixada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fernando Prass, who is down injured.
Ceara's Fernando Prass is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 5, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Ceara throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Paranaense's Vinicius Abner breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Paranaense.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 13, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Carvalho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Paranaense are pushing forward but Erick's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Ceara at Arena da Baixada.
Paranaense drive upfield and Fabinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ceara defender.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara's Ricardinho fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Paranaense are coming forward and Erick gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 20, Ceara have a goal kick.
Leandro Carvalho is back on the pitch.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Throw-in high up the field for Ceara in Curitiba.
At Arena da Baixada, Ceara are penalized for being offside.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 27, Ceara have a goal kick.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 30, Ceara drives forward and Fernando Sobral gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick Paranaense.
Paranaense's Renato Kayzer is on target but unsuccessful.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Paranaense's area.
In the minute 35, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Renato Kayzer for Paranaense is whistled offside.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 37, Eduardo Brock (Ceara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 39, Ceara's Luiz Otavio has been booked in Curitiba.
Ceara advance rapidly upfield but Wilton Pereira Sampaio blows for offside.
In Curitiba, Jorginho of Paranaense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 44, Paranaense's Fabinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Ceara at Arena da Baixada.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 45, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 45, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Ceara a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Arena da Baixada.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Ceara.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, In Curitiba Paranaense attack through Wellington. The finish is off target, however.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Important block from the Paranaense defence as Leandro Carvalho fires in a strike for Ceara.
In the minute 54, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Fabinho for Paranaense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ceara at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 56, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Renato Kayzer (Paranaense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 60, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 62, Leo Cittadini (Paranaense) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Walter is replacing Jorginho for the home team.
Mateus is on a sub for Leandro Carvalho for Ceara.
In the minute 64, Ceara make their first substitution with Bergson replacing Rafael Sobis.
Throw-in Paranaense.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Goal kick for Ceara at Arena da Baixada.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
The home team replace Leo Cittadini with Geuvanio.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense just outside Ceara's area.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 79, Vinicius Goes of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 80, Paranaense push upfield but Wilton Pereira Sampaio quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Ceara.
The away team have replaced Ricardinho with Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca. This is the third substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mateus of Ceara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 83, At Arena da Baixada, Wellington has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ceara's Bergson gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Ceara surge into the attack at Arena da Baixada but Eduardo Brock’s header is off-target.
In the minute 86, Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, The home team replace Wellington with Richard.
Paranaense make their fourth substitution with Ravanelli replacing Jonathan.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Free kick Paranaense.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Ceara a goal kick.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
Wescley is on a sub for Vinicius Goes for Ceara.
Mateus for Ceara has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Paranaense's Geuvanio has been booked in Curitiba.
